title: Resolve providing for an investigation and study by a special commission relative to gender-responsive programming for juvenile justice system involved girls

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Tyler of Boston, a petition (accompanied by resolve, House, No. 2017) of Chynah Tyler for an investigation by a special commission (including members of the General Court) relative to gender responsive programming for juvenile justice system involved girls.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/18/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 11/18/2025 from 01:00 PM-08:00 PM in A-1                                                                                                                                    and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
